text: Lovetap! (stylized as LOVETAP!) is the debut studio album by Los Angeles indie pop band, Smallpools, released on March 24, 2015. The album was made available for streaming on March 17, 2015 via Spotify. == Track listing == Tracks 3, 6, 7, and 13 were previously released on the Smallpools EP ==References== Category:2015 debut albums Category:Smallpools albums
title: Lovetap!
